data.name: Leandro Gavidia Santamaria
data.profile: I am a React front-end developer with a great love for the Web3. I am looking for a position as member of a team in where we can grow together and have a positive impact on people.

academic.degree: Bachelor’s degree in systems engineering, information technology and telematics.
Blockchain and cryptocurrency, JavaScript and English schools.
IBM Courses full stack cloud developer.

experience.jobDescription: My achievements within the agency have focused on improving the agency's website, both in design, code, and performance. Currently, my main function is to create different web products for agency clients.

Within the company, my main challenge was focused on managing and improving a subscription system for different services through different websites created with WordPress and Shopify. These services were aimed at the Spanish public. On the other hand, another achievement within the company was leading a small team of 3 people, which, thanks to task and time management tools and the Scrum methodology, was a success.

An online store was created through the Shopify platform using the “Drop-shipping” sales model. This same store, together with conversion campaigns in Facebook ADS and the Facebook Pixel, managed to obtain a ROAS (return on advertising investment) greater than 5.
